body.p:
Lebanon June 24/62
Hon B Magoffin
Govenor
Dear Sir

The bearer of this is Lafayette Baxter a clever young man and gentleman He is desirious of getting his brother Wm Baxter released from a very heavy fine_ I think it is a case that merits your consideration and one in which you would be justified in interposing -- Mr Baxter will give you a history upon which you may rely -- Believe me your truly
